title: Schork: the rise in oil prices is a massive short-covering
itunes:title: Schork: the rise in oil prices is a massive short-covering
description:
Schork Report's Stephen Schork gives his outlook for the oil market. He joins Tom Keene and Michael McKee on Bloomberg Surveillance.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
